item.description:
App Architecture

Overview

We will grab all our movie data in the Tmdb API. The API already offers login and this means users has the ability to add, remove, update, and rate movies.

App Design Pattern (MVVM)

We are going to use MVVM Design pattern to make it easier for collaborations, scalable, and testing.
